infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FIT_AI uses the camera to provide real-time form feedback during workouts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FIT_AI needs access to your photo library to save workout progress photos.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: FIT_AI syncs your workout data to Apple Health for comprehensive fitness tracking.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: FIT_AI updates Apple Health with calories burned and workout sessions.

plugins.cameraPermission: FIT_AI uses the camera to provide real-time form feedback during workouts.
